strings.Value: "Good day to you, my {mf|baron|baroness|King|Queen}! Travelers from other lands often visit the capital, and your subjects have many contacts in foreign lands, as well. I've managed to acquire something particularly curious from one of my new acquaintances!"

"I couldn't be more proud of my decision to do business in your lands, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. It's easy to stay in touch with my old contacts here, and gain new ones as well. And some of those new contacts are gorgeous! There's plenty of powerful arcanists in the capital these days, and with their help I can acquire truly unique artifacts."
"Here's my latest trophy. A gift for my favorite customer!"
